description: A batch request to retrieve all device positions.

parameters.name: TrackerName
parameters.description: The tracker resource containing the requested devices.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: An optional limit for the number of entries returned in a single call. Default value: 100

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token specifying which page of results to return in the response. If no token is provided, the default page is the first page. Default value: null.

parameters.name: FilterGeometry
parameters.description: The geometry used to filter device positions. Polygon (list) --- The set of arrays which define the polygon. A polygon can have between 4 and 1000 vertices. (list) --- (list) --- (float) ---

nested_params.name: Polygon
nested_params.description: The set of arrays which define the polygon. A polygon can have between 4 and 1000 vertices.

nested_items.name: Entries
nested_items.description: Contains details about each device's last known position.

nested_items.name: DeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the device for this position.

nested_items.name: SampleTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the device position was determined. Uses ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The last known device position. Empty if no positions currently stored.

nested_items.name: Horizontal
nested_items.description: Estimated maximum distance, in meters, between the measured position and the true position of a device, along the Earth's surface.

nested_items.name: PositionProperties
nested_items.description: The properties associated with the position.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A pagination token indicating there are additional pages available. You can use the token in a following request to fetch the next set of results.
